name: advanced-fluid-handling-space-age
title: Advanced Fluid Handling 2.0 Space Age Update
author: Keeper317
description:
Now has advanced pipes for Space Exploration use
--Adds I, L, T, and Cross underground pipe extensions.
--Adds pipes to ground with I, L, T, and Cross shaped underground outputs that are able to be rotated independent of the above ground port with <CTRL + R>.
--Adds an Underground pump.
--Adds adjustable fluid valves (check, overflow, top-up). <NUMPAD + and ->
